subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: J. J. Hardy hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the seventh inning, and the Baltimore Orioles beat the visiting Cincinnati Reds, 9-7, for a three-game sweep.
snippet: J. J. Hardy hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the seventh inning, and the Baltimore Orioles beat the visiting Cincinnati Reds, 9-7, for a three-game sweep.
